verbose_text: The E3 Ub ligases associated with Derlin1 are HRD1 and gp78, however it has not been confirmed whether these ligases are involved in the US11 mediated downregulation of MHC-1.
evidence: E3 Ub ligases associated with Derlin1 are HRD1 and gp78                                 , however it has not been confirmed whether these ligases are involved in the US11-mediated downregulation of MHC-1
